mapper.insert: insert into tbl_inquiry (inquiry_num, inquiry_pw, inquiry_day, inquiry_content, inquiry_title, inquiry_process, user_num) values(#{inquiryNum}, #{inquiryPw}, #{inquiryDay}, #{inquiryContent}, #{inquiryTitle}, #{inquiryProcess}, #{userNum})
mapper.update: update tbl_inquiry set inquiry_title = #{inquiryTitle}, inquiry_content = #{inquiryContent} where user_num = #{userNum} and inquiry_pw = {inquiryPw}
mapper.select: select * from tbl_inquiry where inquiry_num = #{inquiryNum} and inquiry_pw = #{inquiryPw}
select inquiry_num, inquiry_process, user_num, inquiry_day from tbl_inquiry order by inquiry_num desc
